Reviews.Title: Be Warned - Line of sight required from sensor to receiver!
Reviews.Author: SilverGhost
Reviews.Content: I needed a driveway sensor as our main living quarters are on  opposite side of house from driveway. The driveway is about 150' long and lined by thick trees. The house is also surrounded by trees in the direction of the driveway.This sensor requires the sensor, mounted outside, to be in a direct line of sight to the receiver. If you have obstructions that prohibit that, then this won't work. I promptly returned it to Amazon.A few cons on this device:1. The receiver is not very loud, with volume at highest. If you have it in another room and have any noise going, such as a radio or tv, you likely won't hear it.2. It says water resistant. Once you read the instructions, it says it is NOT waterproof, so mount it under an eave or something. Hard to do if you want to mount it on a tree.3. As stated already, it is an IR device, requiring line of sight. The description does not say that, only when I read the instructions did I find that out.

Reviews.Title: Poorly written set-up pairing instructions!  However...
Reviews.Author: Manzaraliman
Reviews.Content: Followed pairing instructions as written.  Unit did not respond as stated in instructions.  Customer service phone support doesn't exist.  Placed on hold over 30 minutes, then disconnected with a message saying, "Thanks for calling, goodbye"!  Decided to freelance and ignore the instructions applying common sense.  Whalla!  It paired.  If you aren't tech savvy or patient, buy another unit.  Will follow-up on serviceability of the unit after a year of service.Update:  Once I solved the pairing problem, the unit has functioned as promised.  Had one false alarm and discovered it was caused by sunshine brightness fluctuating behind clouds.  Repositioned the transmitter and the problem went away.  Maybe I was a little too tough in my initial review, so I'll modify my rating to 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic little device
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: We have a long driveway and this little unit serves as an early warning doorbell placed about 30 feet from my home. It's great at detecting delivery and pool guys, meter readers, wandering deer and incoming unexpected in-laws with easeMake sure to point it in a direction where long grass and tree branches aren't in view as a slight wind will get this baby chiming.Works equally well day or night.The unit looks sleek and I don't mind it being visible where guests can see it.All said, I couldn't be happier with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Samantha Sherrill
Reviews.Content: I have a defender driveway alarm and couldn't find another one. This one is EXACTLY the same, maybe they have bought out defender, idk. The ONLY thing different is the printed name on the front. I love mine. Works great!

Reviews.Title: Good if you know the pitfalls
Reviews.Author: P. Gnehm "Patrick"
Reviews.Content: This works very well but you have to be aware of the pitfalls. The base station runs out of batteries very quickly and thus is basically only usable in locations where you can plug it into an outlet. This is the only downside but it limits its use. Otherwise it's a good product, very solid and well done.

Reviews.Title: Very poor customer service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This item worked as described until it failed. The manufacturers customer service department is so poor, that I would not purchase another item from them. This item worked until one morning at 3 am when it started signaling and would not stop.  It turned out to be a bad PIR sensor which I replaced.  Dealing with this manufacturer's customer service department shows that this company does not value their customer relation, nor does it appear that they want to maintain a returning customer relationship. They quoted me a two to four week turnaround time to repair, or replace the unit.  I replaced this unit with the Chamberlain CWA2000Chamberlain CWA2000 Wireless Motion Alert System (Black) which works great, and allows you to add up to eight sensors, while the SVAT unit only allows you to pair three transmitters.

Reviews.Title: Dom
Reviews.Author: DOMINIC BRACCO
Reviews.Content: This has to be the best driveway monitor ever for this price.Works much better than the AS SEEN ON TV brand.

Reviews.Title: Range Problem
Reviews.Author: silverfox
Reviews.Content: Advertised range is up to 300 ft. My installation was at about 120 ft and never registered any traffic. I had to reduce transmit distance to less than 60 ft to get a signal reliably. All distances were line of site, no obstacles other than a pane of glass. I returned item for refund.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, works great.
Reviews.Author: Hazel
Reviews.Content: We have a long driveway, we live in a rural area.  We wanted this alert system to warn us of cars, people, also animals, that roam the area.The Svat VIS 101 does all this.  We can hear the alarm throughout the house.

Reviews.Title: Motion sensor
Reviews.Author: Sande
Reviews.Content: still trying to get it in the correct position and distance so that is only catches our driveway and not the road.  so far it seems to function well.  I would have liked a more pleasant beep.

Reviews.Title: Svat VIS101 wireless Driveway motion alert system
Reviews.Author: David (PT)
Reviews.Content: This product does just what it says it will do.  It was very easy to install (15 minutes)  You can set the sensitivity of the motion detection.  It even lets me know when my dog wanders down my driveway. It has a two wire connection port to connect to an alarm system.  I wish they sold a bell or alarm that could be wired to our basement, which is too far away for the wireless.  However, the sound of the beeper can be heard anywhere in the house.

Reviews.Title: Better than most
Reviews.Author: CprTP "CprTp"
Reviews.Content: The VIS101 wireless driveway motion alert system works well right out of the box, there have been few false alerts just couple of rabbits  and a cat or two. No wind or tall grass waving in the breeze.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: No more missed FedEx or UPS deliveries.  Works very well, no false alarms.  Only complaint is that the user manual should distinguish between long press and short press for pairing operation.  Other than that I'm very pleased with the device.  I have the sensor mounted on my mailbox post and the receiver in my home about 50 meters away.

Reviews.Title: Svat VIS101 Wireless Driveway Motion Alert System
Reviews.Author: mdgirl
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed with this product. Alarm goes offrepeatedly without stopping. We finally have to turnit off.We have contacted the manufacturer with no results.We have done everything they suggested but it still will not work properly.Now we have no recourse as they would not send thenecessary paper work to have it shipped back to thembefore the warranty time elapsed.I would not recommend buying this product.

Reviews.Title: Defective and no support
Reviews.Author: Bill930turbo
Reviews.Content: instructions are not bad. Powered up both units. When I pressed pairing button on reciever unit would not respond as instructions said with channel 1 LED blinking. Thus could not get sender and receiver to link up. Called 24/7 support left on hold 20 minutes with no personal contact. I have returned for a refund.  Amazon should drop this product!!!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: I bought this motion alert along with a extra one for my front yard which is 3/4 of an acre.  I wanted to be alerted when UPS, the post office or a visitor came up my driveway.  Most of the time I have to leave it off because it picks up the trees or bushes slightly moving in a breeze!  Its so annoying going off all the time over a leaf moving.

Reviews.Title: A quality item
Reviews.Author: Candy Bishop
Reviews.Content: This is not one of those cheapy alert systems.  Yes, it is more expensive than lots of them but it is a quality item.  For the most part, the alarm goes off everytime it should.  Positioning the sensor is critical.  You may have to play with the location and position a bit, as is true with all alert systems.  But this is more reliable than any other I have tried.  I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: William H Cartwright
Reviews.Content: Overall decently manufactured, its is a little hard to setup to start with. Product works well in perfect conditions, sensor will go off constantly in moist conditions. I like that if one is constantly going off you can silence it from the controller, and reactivate it later.

Reviews.Title: Positive
Reviews.Author: Azurefire
Reviews.Content: This product works well unless, of course, when the wind blows madly!  Then we have to turn it off.  Nice to know when someone is driving up our drive.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Me
Reviews.Author: M.F.B. Erlwein
Reviews.Content: I bought this package after scouring Amazon for a driveway alarm. I'm a renter so I need something that is easy to install and that WORKS.  After a very simple install and adjusting the sensitivity I had exactly what I needed for my situation, with a sleek design as the cherry on top.My unit paired easily and was about thirty feet away and through two walls. Since it is a motion sensor it will send signals even for the deer. But that also means your mother-in-law walking up the driveway.Best of luck on your research!

Reviews.Title: responding to e-mail
Reviews.Author: jplaqua
Reviews.Content: yes I would like a free warranty!!! as long as it's free please inform me on how u this all takes place thanks bye

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs!
Reviews.Author: psngt
Reviews.Content: This is packaged as a driveway alert system, but it can also be used as a great home intrusion alert. Both doors on my home are on the opposite side of the house, and since I have to have a fan to sleep with, I've always been uncomfortable with the idea that someone could break in my house with me unaware. Not anymore. This little baby senses the slightest motion and discretely chirps at me to warn of the presence of someone unknown.Older reviews hint at pairing instructions, but they must have gotten the older models, my manual gave simple instructions, and I had this entire system from bringing the Amazon box in my house to set up completely in about 10 minutes.I'm impressed!

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Benny
Reviews.Content: So far so good Doesn't seem to work at the distance they say I now have it at about 100 foot And it seems to work fine Other reviews said the batteries last a long time So far the outside batteries have been Good Tried using batteries on the inside unit They were dead within 2 days So I just keep it plugged in and it works fine

Reviews.Title: Driveway alarm
Reviews.Author: nedo
Reviews.Content: I have this for about 5 months now and it works with out any problems. The only issue I had was pairing the divice after that it worked like a charm. No fals alarms here and I didn't even had to change the battery yet (on the motion device that you will mount it outside ). So far so good.

Reviews.Title: SVAT VIS101 wireless driveway motion sensor
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: The sensor is very reliable and has not had any false alarms yet. This is true even for windy and rainy days.  I'm quite pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: driveway alert
Reviews.Author: Erika Regli "Hoosierette"
Reviews.Content: My main house is about 200 ft. from driveway entrance and this little system works well for me. I like how it chirps when somebody pulls into driveway so I now am informed of somebody coming on my property. Very happy and for the price, you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great warning device
Reviews.Author: Robere
Reviews.Content: This is a must have device. It works as described and for the most part is flawless. Now you will know when someone is snooping around.

Reviews.Title: Yard Monitor
Reviews.Author: Gtrain3
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product because I suspected that a neighbor was scaling my privacy fence and possibly attempting some window-peeping as my wife is a 10+.  I also ordered an additional sensor.  One of the sensors is working very well and I am very pleased with my purchase.  The second sensor, however, is producing false alarm, after false alarm, after false alarm, all night, every night.  How do I know they're false alarms, because at 3:00 a.m., I am traversing my back yard, gun in hand and have yet to see anything moving.  I am going to inquire with the vendor about replacing the one sensor.  Overall, however, I am very pleased with the purchase.
